attributes.additional_details:
Anyone between the ages of 16 and 50 who are medically fit and receiving Social Security Benefits should be made to work to receive such benefits.

The Department of Works and pensions should generate everyday tasks that need to be done (ie Road sweeping, grass cutting, painting, repair of damaged buildings etc, etc)

This will get those dependant on social security benefits to get used to working and not just relying on hand-outs.
